CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 大小；规模；程度；标度；刻度；尺度；标尺；衡量标准；度量标准；刻度尺；比例尺；（心理学和教育学中的）量表；（实物与图表等之间的）比例；比率；比例；（尤指与其他事物相比较时的）范围；等级体系；级别；（价格、工资等的）等级表；级别表；音阶；天平；秤；磅秤；秤砣；天平盘；秤盘；鳞；鱼鳞；鳞片；水垢；牙垢
测量；估量；衡量；调节；评估；削减；减少规模；缩放；（按比例或缩尺）绘制；调整大小；改变…的大小；称重；称得重量为；脱落；去鳞；刮除（如鱼鳞）；（鳞片般地）剥落；剥去…的外壳；去除（如牙垢）；估算（木材的）体积；量度圆木材积；攀登；逐级上升；爬越；到达…顶点；（阶梯）逐步升高

synonym.mean: 规模；比例；鳞；刻度；天平；数值范围
测量；攀登；刮鳞；依比例决定

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可攀登的；可去鳞的；可称量的
有鳞的；（房屋）栉比鳞次的；已去了鳞的
刮去鳞片；生鳞片（scale的过去式和过去分词）
缩放比例；刮治术，[口腔] 刮牙术；鳞片排列
剥落；刮鳞；生水垢（scale的ing形式）
攀登者；[电子] 定标器；刮器

word_group.brief_definition: 按比例增加, 相应增加
比例缩减, 缩小规模, 缩减
按比例减少, 相应缩减
绝对温标；开尔文温标；开氏温标

bilingual.source: The scale of the building is enormous.
bilingual.target: 这座建筑物的规模极大。

bilingual.source: We plan to enlarge the scale of production.
bilingual.target: 我们计划增大生产规模。

bilingual.source: It's hard to comprehend the scale of the universe.
The company is expanding its operational scale.
bilingual.target: 这家公司正在扩大其运营规模。

bilingual.source: The small shop has a very limited scale of operation.
bilingual.target: 这家小店的经营规模很小。

bilingual.source: The army is conducting a large-scale manoeuvre.
bilingual.target: 军队正在进行一场大规模的演习。

bilingual.source: They are conducting a large-scale market survey.
bilingual.target: 他们正在进行大规模的市场调查。

bilingual.source: We need to expand the company's scale of operation.
bilingual.target: 我们需要扩大公司的经营规模。

bilingual.source: The scale of this city is larger than I imagined.
bilingual.target: 这个城市的规模比我想象的要大。

bilingual.source: The military is conducting a large-scale exercise.
bilingual.target: 军方正在进行一次大规模的演习。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm prepared to scale back significantly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我准备对导弹防御系统进行大规模削减。

yingyinNormal.en: This is TV on a huge scale. And it is extraordinary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个电视台规模庞大。绝对让你叹为观止。

yingyinNormal.en: And the true scale of production is revealed from the air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从空中鸟瞰，便可得见这生产的真是规模。

yingyinNormal.en: Cities have been built to a size and scale not matched in any previous period in world history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 建成城市的大小和规模前无古人。

yingyinNormal.en: China's rapidly growing cities have caused pollution on a scale not seen in history.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国迅速发展的众多城市引发了污染，其规模史无前例。

yingyinNormal.en: This vast quantity of corn makes it possible to produce beef on an industrial scale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巨量的玉米让这一切成为可能，让我们能够以工业级的规模生产牛肉。

yingyinNormal.en: A laser cannon? We're not sure how to describe a weapon of this scale. It's another Death Star.
yingyinNormal.zh: 激光炮吗？我们不知道怎么形容此种规模的武器。又是一颗死星。

yingyinNormal.en: You see, this trench is as important to manufacturing today as the railroads were in 19th-century America, because it holds something that is connecting every home in this remote area to the world, something that's distributing goods and ideas on an unprecedented scale, fiber-optic cable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个海沟对于现在的制造业很重要，十九世纪美国的铁路因为它，拥有一些世界上远程连接每家每户的东西，一些分发物品，分享信息规模之大史无前例。光纤电缆。

yingyinNormal.en: But succeed it has, on an unimaginable scale!
yingyinNormal.zh: 但事实证明，新加坡获得了空前的成就！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, look, now he's boring on an international scale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看吧，他现在无聊到有够国际水准了。

yingyinNormal.en: We've created a scale so that we can forget its unfathomable scale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们创造出度量衡好忘却这一切都是深不可测。

yingyinNormal.en: I can only consider a partial scale-back if you announce it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只有在你会对外宣布的情况下，我才接受部分让步。

yingyinNormal.en: On a scale of one to ten, how would you rate your pain? Zero.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从一到十，你的痛感是几级? 零。

yingyinNormal.en: You have a will? Yeah, my 1/18 scale Wil Wheaton action figure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还立好遗嘱啦？是啊，1:18真人比例的威尔·惠顿手办。

yingyinNormal.en: Soaking your opponents on this grand scale has a religious basis.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这场声势浩大的互相泼水有一个虔诚的目标。

yingyinNormal.en: It's China's biggest party, TV on a huge scale, the Chunwan Gala.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是中国最大的派对，宏大的电视节目，春节晚会。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? Tell that to the bathroom scale, cause one of you is lying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗? 跟体重秤说去，因为你们其中一个在撒谎。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll ask how long they can give us and what scale of payment they'll accept.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会问问他们能宽限多久，能接受什么额度的付款，

yingyinNormal.en: On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your pain? Physical, or emotional?
yingyinNormal.zh: 从一到十级，你的疼痛指数是？你是说生理上的，还是心理上的？

yingyinNormal.en: China's large interior allows for engineering projects to be rolled out on a grand scale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中国广袤的内陆使得诸多工程项目得以开展实施，而且体量巨大。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 规模; 程度; 范围
天平; 磅秤; 称重
(scale up)增大; 扩大规模或产量

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 去鳞的；（房屋等）鳞次栉比的；有鳞状斑点的
n. 缩放比例；刮治术；定标

word_family.mean: n. 鱼鳞；鳞甲；鱼鳞状物；片状沉淀；天平；磅秤；等级；级别；规模；程度；范围；音阶

sense_info_list.en: the size or extent of something, especially when compared with something else
sense_info_list.zh: 规模; 程度; 范围

examination_example.sentence: We're also giving our customers better channels versus picking up the phone to accomplish something beyond human <highlight>scale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们还为客户提供了更好的渠道，而不是拿起电话来完成超出人类能力范围的事情。

examination_example.sentence: If software promises to save lives on the <highlight>scale</highlight> that drugs now can, big data may be expected to behave as a big pharma has done.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果软件技术承诺其拯救生命的规模可以与当下的药物相匹敌，那么大数据也许有望像大型制药公司那样发挥作用。

examination_example.sentence: The housing sector needs to accept that we are very unlikely to ever return to the era of large-<highlight>scale</highlight> public grants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 住房行业需要接受这样一个事实:我们不太可能回到大规模公共拨款的时代。

sense_info_list.zh: 天平; 磅秤; 称重

examination_example.sentence: As for me, weighing myself every day caused me to shift my focus from being generally healthy and physically active, to focusing solely on the <highlight>scale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我来说，每天称体重使我的注意力从一般的健康和身体活动转移到仅仅关注体重秤上。

examination_example.sentence: I've also experienced greater success in achieving my specific fitness goals, because I'm training according to those goals, not the numbers on a <highlight>scale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在达到自己特定健身目标方面也取得了更大的成功，因为我是根据这些目标进行训练的，而不是根据体重秤上的数字。

examination_example.sentence: Rather than obsessing over the <highlight>scale</highlight>, turn your focus to how you look, feel, how your clothes fit and your overall energy level.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与其纠结于体重，不如把你的注意力放在你的外表、感觉、衣服是否合身以及你的整体精力水平上。

sense_info_list.en: represent in proportional dimensions; reduce or increase in size according to a common scale

examination_example.sentence: The British land art, typified by Richard Long's piece, was not only more domestically <highlight>scaled</highlight>, but a lot quirkier than its American counterpart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以Richard Long的作品为代表的英国地景艺术，不仅比国内规模更大，而且比美国的同类作品要古怪得多。

examination_example.sentence: British Land Art as shown in this well selected, but relatively modestly <highlight>scaled</highlight> exhibition wasn't about imposing on the landscape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个精心挑选但规模相对适中的展览中展示的英国地景艺术，并不是要对景观施加影响。

sense_info_list.en: a graduated range of values forming a standard system for measuring or grading something

examination_example.sentence: The interviewers had rated applicants on a <highlight>scale</highlight> of one to five.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面试官按照从1到5的等级划分申请人。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>scale</highlight> took numerous factors into consideration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一等级标准考虑了很多因素。

sense_info_list.zh: (scale up)增大; 扩大规模或产量

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>scaling</highlight> up of these technologies will eventually bring costs down, we will all have to pay the price of the necessary transition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些技术的扩展最终会降低成本，我们都必须付出必要的过渡的代价。

sense_info_list.en:
any of the thin plates of hard material that cover the skin of many fish and reptiles;
remove the small flat hard pieces of skin from a fish
climb up or over something high and steep
a series of marks at regular intervals in a line used in measuring something

exam_freq_info.chinese: 按比例绘制/设计; 比例

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 原尺寸的；足尺的；无限制的；完全的；彻底的

word_family.mean: n. 鱼鳞；鳞甲；鱼鳞状物；片状沉淀；天平；磅秤；等级；级别；规模；程度；范围；音阶

sense_info_list.en: the size or extent of something, especially when compared with something else

examination_example.sentence: These include the huge size of the mines, the <highlight>scale</highlight> of equipment, and the repetitive nature of some of the work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些包括矿场的巨大规模，设备的规模，以及一些工作的重复性。

examination_example.sentence: On another <highlight>scale</highlight>, he was a perpetual outsider.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从另一种程度来讲，他永远是一个局外人。

examination_example.sentence: Once we <highlight>scale</highlight> up, algorithms must be sensitive to tiny changes in identities and at the same time invariant to lighting, pose, age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦我们扩大数据库，算法必须对面部特征的微小差异十分敏感，同时不受光线、姿势和年龄的影响。

examination_example.sentence: System institutions are operating very efficiently based on this analysis, raising the question of the value of pursuing a broad <highlight>scale</highlight> outsourcing initiative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于这一分析，董事系统机构运作得非常有效率，这引发了推行大规模外包计划的价值问题。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>scaled</highlight> an altitude of only 12 meters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的高度只有12米。

sense_info_list.en: represent in proportional dimensions; reduce or increase in size according to a common scale
sense_info_list.zh: 按比例绘制/设计; 比例

examination_example.sentence: The main aim of this is to <highlight>scale</highlight> our leather rescue project, starting with off-cuts from the production of Burberry leather goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其主要目的是扩大我们的皮革救援项目，从巴宝莉皮革制品生产的边角料开始。

sense_info_list.en: a device for weighing things or people

any of the thin plates of hard material that cover the skin of many fish and reptiles;
remove the small flat hard pieces of skin from a fish

exam_freq_info.chinese: 按比例绘制/设计; 比例

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 原尺寸的；足尺的；无限制的；完全的；彻底的

word_family.mean: n. 鱼鳞；鳞甲；鱼鳞状物；片状沉淀；天平；磅秤；等级；级别；规模；程度；范围；音阶

sense_info_list.en: the size or extent of something; especially when compared with something else

examination_example.sentence: Schools and teachers have consistently reported the <highlight>scale</highlight> of the problem since 2009.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自2009年以来，学校和教师一直在报告问题的严重程度。

examination_example.sentence: The idea, as he has put it, is to offer businesses "rapid, long-distance connectivity on a massive <highlight>scale</highlight>. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如其所言，这样做的目的是让各商业机构能“大规模地进行高速地远程连接”。

examination_example.sentence: A vertical solar project on such a large <highlight>scale</highlight> has never been repeated since.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如此大规模的垂直太阳能项目从那以后再也没有出现过。

sense_info_list.en: a range of levels or numbers used for measuring something

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays you can't buy anything without then being asked to provide a rating of a company's performance on a five-star <highlight>scale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，如果不被要求提供一个五星等级的公司业绩评级，你就什么也买不到。

examination_example.sentence: By contrast, the Multidimensional State Boredom <highlight>Scale</highlight>, developed in 2008, measures a person's feelings of boredom in a given situation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比之下，2008年开发的多维状态无聊量表衡量了一个人在特定情况下的无聊感。

examination_example.sentence: In 1986, psychologists introduced the Boredom Proneness <highlight>Scale</highlight>, designed to measure an individual's overall tendency to feel bored.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1986 年，心理学家推出了无聊倾向量表，旨在衡量个人感到无聊的总体倾向。

sense_info_list.en:
any of the thin plates of hard material that cover the skin of many fish and reptiles; 
remove the small flat hard pieces of skin from a fish
climb up or over something high and steep
represent in proportional dimensions; reduce or increase in size according to a common scale
sense_info_list.zh: 按比例绘制/设计; 比例

exam_freq_info.chinese: 刻度; 程度; 规模

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 刻度; 程度; 规模

exam_freq_info.chinese: 刻度; 程度; 规模

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: "My favorite thing about the pangolin is the <highlight>scales</highlight> (鳞片) it has on its body. They look cool, "Landon said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我最喜欢穿山甲的是它身上的鳞片。它们看起来很酷。”兰登说。

examination_example.sentence: They take off their <highlight>scales</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们脱掉了鳞片。

sense_info_list.zh: 刻度; 程度; 规模

examination_example.sentence: In 1897,they began to use the following grading <highlight>scale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1897年，他们开始使用以下的评分标准。

examination_example.sentence: Because there wasn't a <highlight>scale</highlight> large enough, some soldiers advised him to cut it up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为没有足够大的秤，一些士兵建议他把它切碎。
